title: Load Balancing Made Easy
body: Improve load times and eliminate downtime and with Cloudflare's easy to use load balancing. Includes intelligent traffic routing, server health checks, multi-cloud compatibility, and traffic analytics.

title: Set up bot protection
body: Stop inventory hoarding, credit card stuffing, content scraping, click fraud, and other threats from bad bots. Configure Super Bot Fight Mode included with your Business plan.
